name: Resin with Embedded Flowers
prompt: A VibeDeck controller made of clear epoxy resin with real dried flowers, leaves, and petals embedded inside the transparent body. Pink roses, lavender, baby's breath visible suspended in the clear material. Buttons are smooth resin domes with flowers inside each one. The rotary knob has a single perfect rose in the center. Ethereal, romantic, nature preserved in technology. Soft natural lighting.
why: Unique art piece, feminine aesthetic, nature meets tech
